Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: Man I will try login to mine I assume its dead. If anyone has any questions about it let me know. Happy to help any new comers. What dwy has said is just about right read the scripts understand what does what. There are many ways to improve. Comes down to responding the fastest to other nodes. That's exactly how to get better counts. The hard part is finding something that makes you respond faster. Less utxo means less to process. You can also customise the notarizer to make it just respond faster...
